actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on (5-cyclopropyl-4-isoxazolyl)[2-(methylsulfonyl)-4-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]methoanone (Isoxaflutole).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on (5-cyclopropyl-4-isoxazolyl)[2-(methylsulfonyl)-4-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]methoanone (Isoxaflutole).

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on (5-cyclopropyl-4-isoxazolyl)[2-(methylsulfonyl)-4-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]methoanone (Isoxaflutole).
